New Records: Scottie Barnes scored a career-high 33 points with 13 rebounds
Immanuel Quickley returned to the lineup and recorded a season-high 15 assists
Key Match Events: Immanuel Quickley's four straight assists leading to a 15-point lead late in the game
Ben Simmons struggled with only two points on 5 shot attempts
Pre-Game Insights: The Raptors were coming off a franchise-worst 54-point loss and needed a win to snap an 11-game slide
The Nets were dealing with a three-game losing streak and recent acquisition D'Angelo Russell's return
Post-Match Reflections: The Raptors' coach highlighted the win as a crucial step toward the championship
Nicolas Claxton had 16 points and 10 rebounds but the Nets couldn't capitalize on their opportunities
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the first home win for the Raptors since December 3
Noah Clowney and Maxwell Lewis suffered injuries during the game
